title: How long does it take to write a paragraph? - Quora

response.answer_text: To write a fruitfull ,beautiful pargraph it just takes 20–30minutes, provided we have all the righteous information with us.For example,writing a paragraph about recent advancements in the field of science and technology.Its important to know about the recent advancements,their pro’s and con’s,their advantages,their limitations,facts and much more. Its also important to know the format and pattern of a meaningfull paragarph.A meaningfull paragraph contains small intro upon the subject,few proverbs or facts depending on the subject.Use of adjectives in a paragraph enhances the effectivness of the paragraph. Thank You.
